data.text: “Mtima wanga ukulumphalumpha pa chimenechinso
Tamverani! Tamverani kubangula kwa liwu lake,
Iye amaponya chingʼaningʼani chake pansi pa thambo lonse
Pambuyo pake kubangula kwake kumamveka.
Liwu la Mulungu limabangula mʼnjira zambiri zodabwitsa
Amalamula chisanu chowundana kuti, ‘Igwa pa dziko lapansi,’
Kuti anthu onse amene anawalenga athe kuzindikira ntchito yake.
Zirombo zimakabisala
Mphepo yamkuntho imatuluka ku malo ake,
Mpweya wa Mulungu umawunditsa madzi
Iye amadzaza mitambo ndi madzi a mvula,
Mulungu amayendetsa mitamboyo
Iye amagwetsa mvula kuti alange anthu,
“Abambo Yobu, tamvani izi;
Kodi mukudziwa momwe Mulungu amayendetsera mitambo
Kodi mukudziwa momwe Mulungu amayalira mitambo,
Inu amene mʼzovala zanu mumatuluka thukuta
kodi mungathe kuthandizana naye kutambasula thambo
“Tiwuzeni ife zoti tikanene kwa Iye;
Kodi nʼkofunika kumudziwitsa Mulungu kuti ndili naye mawu?
Tsopano munthu sangathe kuyangʼana dzuwa,
Kuwala kwake kumaonekera cha kumpoto;
Wamphamvuzonse sitingathe kumufikira pafupi ndi wa mphamvu zoposa;
Nʼchifukwa chake anthu amamuopa kwambiri,
